Surah.title: Surah
Surah.description: Represents a Surah (chapter) in the Quran.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Surah entity.

number.description: The number of the Surah in the Quran.

nameArabic.description: The name of the Surah in Arabic.

nameIndonesian.description: The name of the Surah in Indonesian.

totalAyahs.description: The total number of Ayahs (verses) in the Surah.

Ayah.title: Ayah
Ayah.description: Represents an Ayah (verse) in the Quran.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Ayah entity.

numberInSurah.description: The number of the Ayah within its Surah.

textArabic.description: The Arabic text of the Ayah.

textIndonesian.description: The Indonesian translation of the Ayah.

textTransliteration.description: The transliteration of the Ayah from Arabic to Indonesian.

Tafsir.title: Tafsir
Tafsir.description: Represents a Tafsir (interpretation) of an Ayah.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tafsir entity.

source.description: The source of the Tafsir (e.g., name of the book).

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application. Note: Does not store authentication data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

settings.description: User specific settings, such as preferred theme, text size, etc. Represented as a JSON string.

VerseBookmark.title: VerseBookmark
VerseBookmark.description: Represents a bookmark created by a user for a specific verse.

id.description: Unique identifier for the VerseBookmark entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the bookmark was created.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Doa entity.

ayat.description: The Arabic text of the prayer.

Hadith.title: Hadith
Hadith.description: Represents a Hadith of Prophet Muhammad SAW.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Hadith entity.

namaHadist.description: The title or name of the Hadith.

tulisanArab.description: The Arabic text of the Hadith.

penjelasan.description: An explanation or context for the Hadith.

riwayat.description: The narrator or source of the Hadith (e.g., HR. Bukhari).

PrayerSchedule.title: PrayerSchedule
PrayerSchedule.description: Represents prayer schedules for a specific city and month, cached from an external API.

id.description: Composite unique identifier for the schedule, typically in the format 'cityId_year_month'.

cityId.description: The ID of the city for which the schedule is.

schedules.description: An array of daily prayer time objects for the entire month.

Advertisement.title: Advertisement
Advertisement.description: Represents an advertisement slot in the application.

id.description: The unique identifier for the ad, often matching the position ID.

positionId.description: The defined position where the ad will appear (e.g., 'sidebar-footer').

adCode.description: The HTML/JavaScript code snippet for the ad provided by the ad network.

isActive.description: A flag to enable or disable the ad slot.

/advertisements/{adId}.description: Stores advertisement code snippets for various positions in the app.
